snippet: Thousands of Bostonians lined the 10-mile route to view the procession for Thomas M. Menino, who died Thursday at the age of 71, just 10 months after he left office — too young and too soon, many said.
abstract: Thousands of Bostonians line 10-mile route to view funeral procession for Thomas M Menino, city's longest-serving mayor who died at age 71 just 10 months after leaving office.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of Bostonians lined the 10-mile route to view the procession for Thomas M. Menino, who died Thursday at the age of 71, just 10 months after he left office — too young and too soon, many said.

headline.main: Bells Tolling for Miles, Boston Offers a Goodbye to Former Mayor
headline.print_headline: Bells Tolling for Miles, Boston Offers a Goodbye
